title: 30441% of LGBTQ+ television characters have been axed amid nationwide rollback of woke DEI policies
content:
305 41% of LGBTQ+ television characters have been axed amid nationwide rollback of woke DEI policies and initiatives, according to Deadline. / Let's hit 100% posted 9 hours ago by PiratePatriotParrot 14 comments award share report block E X X ➠A L E R T S @ExxAlerts • 18h JUST IN: 41% of LGBTQ+ television characters have been axed amid nationwide rollback of woke DEI policies and initiatives, according to Deadline.
